Bio

Related

Stats

Historical

Biography

2023: Started all eight games he competed in as a sophomore (missed remainder of season to injury) ... Tallied a team-high three assists ... Had his first two-assist match as part of a 3-0 victory against Manhattan (Sept. 5) ... Assisted Chad Baker's 58th-minute goal in a 1-1 draw against LIU (Sept. 16) ... Played teh full 90 against LIU, Quinnipiac (Sept. 19) and Harvard (Sept. 30).

2022: Played in all 16 games as a first-year, earning 15 starts ... Totaled six shots, one on goal ... Totaled 1,328 minutes, third-most on the team to Max Gonzalez (1,341) and Michael Collodi (1,350) ... Went the full 90 on 11 occasions ... Played 51 minutes off the bench in his collegiate debut at George Washington (Sept. 2) ... Earned a place in the Starting XI for the first time in the home opener against Stony Brook (Sept. 6) ... Took his first collegiate shot and shot on goal at Manhattan (Sept. 9) ... Started and played all 90 minutes of a 1-0 shutout over perennial powerhouse St. John's (Sept. 12) ... Made his Ivy League debut at home against Brown, starting and going the full 90 in a 0-0 draw (Oct. 1).

Prior to Columbia: Defender from nearby Manhasset ... Brings top-level experience from the Met Oval Academy ... Three-year fullback began with Met Oval in 2020, playing up to the U17 squad as a 15-year-old ... Averaged an assist a game before moving up to the U19 level at age 17 in 2022 ... Top performance that season included a game in which he scored and tallied three assists ... Club team has been ranked as high as No. 10 in the country by TopDrawerSoccer.com ... Active soccer trainer in his spare time ... High Honor Roll student at Manhasset.

Personal: Born May 20, 2004 in Queens, N.Y. ... Son of Adrienne & Carmine Falco ... Sister, Alexandra, is currently a sophomore on the Boston College crew team ... A self-taught guitarist ... Volunteers with Operation Smile Club, which helps raise money for children with cleft lips.
